TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRequiresSessionState

summary.span: 指定目标 HTTP 处理程序需要对会话状态值具有读写访问权。

span.span: Specifies that the target HTTP handler requires read and write access to session-state values.

summary.span: 这是一个标记接口，没有任何方法。

span.span: This is a marker interface and has no methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现接口在自定义 HTTP 处理程序中以标识您的处理程序需要的读取和写入访问权限会话状态的值。Implement the interface in your custom HTTP handler to identify that your handler requires read and write access to session-state values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查当前的 HTTP属性来确定是否需要对读取和写入访问会话状态的值。The following code example examines the current HTTP property to determine whether it requires read and write access to session-state values. [!code-csharp[HttpSessionState#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/CS/snippetscs.aspx#32)] [!code-vb[HttpSessionState#32](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpSessionState/VB/snippetsvb.aspx#32)]
